name: graphql-compose-relay
description: Plugin for `graphql-compose` which wraps graphql types with Relay specific logic.

scripts.build: npm run build-cjs && npm run build-mjs
scripts.build-cjs: rimraf lib && babel src --ignore __tests__,__mocks__ -d lib && COPY_TO_FOLDER=lib npm run build-flow
scripts.build-mjs: rimraf mjs && BABEL_ENV=mjs babel src --ignore __tests__,__mocks__ -d mjs && yarn build-mjs-rename && COPY_TO_FOLDER=mjs npm run build-flow
scripts.build-flow: find ./src -name '*.js' -not -path '*/__*' | while read filepath; do cp $filepath `echo ./${COPY_TO_FOLDER:-lib}$filepath | sed 's/.\/src\//\//g'`.flow; done
scripts.test: npm run coverage && npm run lint && npm run flow
scripts.link: yarn build && yarn link graphql-compose && yarn link
scripts.unlink: yarn unlink graphql-compose && yarn add graphql-compose
